Fire Dragon Bride Leona Blackbird:
I'm not sure since when, but the Chaos Fragments from the Phantasmal Ridge started giving off an eerie energy. As time passed, that energy grew stronger, and I asked Devianne to investigate. She said that those Chaos Fragments were much more powerful than the regular ones.
After that, we started calling them High-Grade Chaos Fragments, and we started investigating the reason for the change.
